BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Twenty four hours a day: the latest national and international stories as they break.

BasicDescription.Title: Head 2 Head
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A lively topical discussion programme, with two studio guests from opposite sides of the political debate going head to head over the key issues and controversies of the week.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Twenty four hours a day: the latest national and international stories as they break.

BasicDescription.Title: Dateline London
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Foreign correspondents based in London give an outsider's view of events in the UK.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Twenty four hours a day: the latest national and international stories as they break.

BasicDescription.Title: The Record Europe
BasicDescription.Synopsis: An in-depth look at the politics of Europe presented by Shirin Wheeler.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Twenty four hours a day: the latest national and international stories as they break.

BasicDescription.Title: HARDtalk
BasicDescription.Synopsis: David Walker, US Comptroller General, talks to Stephen Sackur about the fiscal "tsunami" which threatens to overwhelm the American Government and citizens alike.

BasicDescription.Title: The World Today
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest international news.

BasicDescription.Title: World Business Report
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest business news from around the world with live reports from Singapore, Frankfurt and London and the news of what happened overnight in New York.

BasicDescription.Title: Breakfast
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The latest news, sport, business and weather, including regional news at 25 and 55 minutes past each hour.

BasicDescription.Synopsis: Twenty four hours a day: the latest national and international stories as they break.

BasicDescription.Title: Sportsday
BasicDescription.Synopsis: A round up of all the day's sports events.

BasicDescription.Title: News 24 Tonight
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The best of the BBC's journalism from all of the BBC's television outlets. Featuring stories from the One and Six O'Clock News bulletins, Breakfast, BBC World and national and regional newsrooms.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Twenty four hours a day: the latest national and international stories as they break.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Twenty four hours a day: the latest national and international stories as they break.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC Ten O'Clock News Hour
BasicDescription.Synopsis: The BBC's Ten O'Clock News with further reports on the day's sport and business plus reviews of tomorrow's newspapers.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Twenty four hours a day: the latest national and international stories as they break.

BasicDescription.Title: HARDtalk
BasicDescription.Synopsis: David Walker, US Comptroller General, talks to Stephen Sackur about the fiscal "tsunami" which threatens to overwhelm the American Government and citizens alike.

BasicDescription.Title: BBC News
BasicDescription.Synopsis: Twenty-four hours a day: the latest national and international stories as they break.

BasicDescription.Title: World Business Report
BasicDescription.Synopsis: From London and New York, World Business Report brings not just the headlines but the explanation behind the headlines and an examination of the trends in technology and the world of business.
